messages.title: Standing up for Britain!
messages.content: I’m asking for you to elect me as your Member of Parliament because I want to do the best for Dagenham & Rainham. I'm standing up for the things that matter most to us. Let's get Brexit done and get our fair share of police increases. We need to grow our local NHS services and I will do my utmost to protect and campaign for Queen’s and King George hospitals and I will make sure we get our fair share of government spending on the NHS. Let’s grow Dagenham & Rainham into a place of excellence - we need to attract investment in jobs and greater housing opportunities for our younger people. I will continue to campaign for more police on our streets and for a fairer deal for Dagenham and Rainham.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Supporting Boris to get Britain out of the European Union.
£14 billion extra for the NHS, funding for every school, £200 million for the NHS every week.
Supporting and increasing local NHS services.
Growing Dagenham & Rainham into a place of excellence, attracting investment in jobs and housing.
